concept.title: 5335.070-1 Indemnification Under Research and Development Contracts

conbody.p: (a) The authority to approve requests for indemnification for unusually hazardous risks under 10 U.S.C. 2354 is delegated to the following officials, without power to relegate: AFMC/PK SCO, AFLCMC/PK SCO and SMC/PK SCO.
